Mike and Paul 
 
Thanks for the info. What I'm looking for is a set of Armour from the Edo Period or just before, that I can use during a living history display. It looks good, functions well and will not fall apart, will last for a long time to be passed on. What has cough my eye is the set that Tom Cruise wore during the movie The Last Samurai. Either Black or in Ox blood color. This Armour will be used on horse and in training. It needs to be good quality.
 
Takara

Michael Peters <shdwstel@...> wrote:
Paul,
  Matsushita-san (Kozando-sensei) is a friend of mine. While I would 
classify his and Marutake-san's as the easiest choice, we really should find 
out exactly what the person wants.

Takara,

  What exactly do you want? Boy's day armour? Display sets? Museum quality 
reproductions? Antiques? More specifics can get you better results.


MJPeters
